name: Free Delivery (trijam 202)
description:
You need to deliver blue cubes for 'free for all' the people. (yes thats the relevance to the theme) within 5 mintues.

Press down near a box to pick it up and walk towards someone to deliver the box. The more boxes you carry, the slower you move and the less midair jumps you have.

The game is randomly generated to an extent, so every round should differ from the last, (and the person in the hub room doesn't accept boxes)

Made in 3 hours (except for compiling) for the trijam #202.

I made the music in famitracker, the drawings in aseprite, sfx made in jsfxr and the game itself in unity.
